transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Hello?
Executive: Ji mam.
Customer: Ji very good evening sir. ST Overseas Solar Solution company me baat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Ha ji ha ji mam bol raha hu.
Customer: Ji mai Pooja baat kar rahi thi sir Indiamart office se.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Executive: To ye Pradeep ji ne number aapka diya tha. Abhi aap hi Indiamart handle karenge?
Customer: Ha ji mam ab mai hi karunga.
Executive: Okay okay thik hai. To yaha se possible hoga mai aapke registered email id pe mai aapko video meeting ki link share kar du. Jisme mai aapko proper guide kar pau ki kaise service ko use karna hai. Matlab ek proper training mai guide kar deti hu.
Customer: Email id batau aapko?
Executive: Ji ji yaha pe jo register ek minute.
Executive: Jo register email id hai na aapki overseas company ki. Uspe mai link share kar du join kar payenge aap?
Customer: Ha join kar lenge koi problem nahi.
Executive: Ek minute.
Executive: Mujhe ek baar email id confirm karenge sir?
Customer: Email id ek second email id dikhana chahe email id aati.
Customer: Email id ek baar confirm karo Google meet ke liye hai. Aa gayi na aapne mail bheji hai na Pooja Jaiswal ji bol rahi hai na?
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Ji aa gaya aa gaya. Ha. Maine aapko share kiya hai ST Overseas Solar @gmail.com.
Executive: Thik thik.
Executive: Thik hai mai. Thik hai aap ek baar. Ha usse join with Google meet pe click karke na aap meeting join kar lijiye. Kaise karenge aap batayenge sir desktop se ya laptop se mobile se?
Customer: Nahi mobile se hi join karunga.
Executive: Mobile se karenge?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To mobile se karne ke liye to ye mail id se matlab ye hai na sir aap to dusri mail id login karenge fir.
Customer: Achha to agar laptop se karenge to fir aap.
Executive: Laptop se karenge to usme already login hoga. Aap kaise handle karenge aap aise bataye to agar aap kahe to mai aapko whatsapp pe bhi share kar deti hu. Kyunki agar aap dusri mail id se join karenge to wo aapko pehle batana hoga kyunki meeting me update karna hoga.
Customer: To to fir aap whatsapp pe share kar dijiye mam to kyunki mai mobile pe hi join karna hu.
Executive: Mujhe whatsapp number repeat karenge?
Customer: 74
Executive: 74
Customer: 17
Executive: 17
Customer: 70
Executive: 70
Customer: 6347
Executive: 6347
Executive: Indiamart application download hai aapke paas?
Customer: Ha ji download hai.
Executive: Aap ek baar check kar lijiye Pooja Jaiswal ke naam se sorry. Maine aapko whatsapp kiya hai. Mera number aapke paas save nahi hai isliye wo link pe click nahi hoga. Ji aa gaya aa gaya.
Executive: Pehle aap hi message kariye tab wo activate hoga.
Customer: Thik hai mam.
Executive: Ab aap kar diya. Click karke meeting ko join kar lijiye. Mail id se join kar rahe hai na sir wo mail id please aap mujhe note karke update kar dijiye kyunki meeting me update karna hoga.
Customer: Thik hai to mai aapko link. Ji ye lijiye mam mail id aapko share kar dijiye. Deepu.tomer25@gmail.com.
Executive: Ji ji.
Executive: Thik hai mam.
Executive: Aap link pe click kariye join with Google meet ka option aayega.
Customer: Thik thik karta hu.
Executive: Thik.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs guidance on using IndiaMART services.

- Customer wants to join the meeting from mobile.

- Customer needs to update the correct email ID.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to share a video meeting link.

- Executive shared the meeting link on WhatsApp.

- Executive requested the customer to update email ID.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- training, google meet, email id, whatsapp
